item.title: Morning Pages: What should I write about?
item.description: I’ve been journalling for almost 2 years now but some days I get stuck and can’t think of anything to write about. I did a bit of searching to see if anybody had advice on solving this problem and found a few different articles: The Productive Benefits of Journaling (plus 11 ideas for making the habit stick) Read This If You Want To Keep A Journal But Don’t Know How
